title: Don’t post photos of outings until you’re back – Police
body_lines: COLOBMO (News 1st); Sri Lankan Police warned the public NOT to post photos of trips or excursions undertaken during the New Year season on social media.
Senior DIG & Senior Police Spokesman, Ajith Rohana said that by posting such a way people could be a victim of a crime.
He also called on the public to take action to protect motorcycles, three-wheelers, and jewelry from drug addicts.
Will Smith wins his first-ever Oscar – for best actor in ‘King Richard’
CODA’s Troy Kotsur becomes second deaf performer to win Oscar
